category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
definition: The Female Sleuth, Type-1-2 emoji is a sequence of the ?? Sleuth or Spy, ?? Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-1-2, ? Female Sign and ? Variati http://emojipedia.org/female-sleuth-type-1-2/
name: woman detective: light skin tone
note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the light-skinned woman detective emoji stands with a determined posture, her trench coat rendered with subtle, realistic folds and soft rounded edges. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading accentuates the texture of her attire and the keen glint in her eye, suggesting an intelligent and inquisitive spirit. She embodies the pursuit of truth and the thrill of uncovering mysteries, a common symbol for investigation and problem-solving in digital conversations.
